description.name: linkarbitrum
description.tagline: ChainLink Token arbitrum Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto arbitrum-link Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept ChainLink Token arbitrum directly on your website
Unique arbitrum/link receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your arbitrum/link wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
